Operation 'getCheckinURLs' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, vague_description, missing_context, missing_input_details, missing_output_details, poor_ai_interpretability. The improved version clarifies that this retrieves check-in links by airline code, explains the practical purpose, specifies the input format (IATA codes), identifies the return type (CheckinLink objects), and provides context for when an AI agent should use this operation. data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve airline check-in links by airline code
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves check-in URLs for specified airlines. This operation returns direct links to airline check-in pages, enabling users to access online check-in services. Accepts airline IATA codes as input parameters and returns a collection of CheckinLink objects containing URLs and metadata for each airline. Useful for integrating airline check-in functionality into travel applications.
